movie_title: MOTIVATIONAL SPEECH | OVERCOMING ANXIETY: Finding Clarity (English Subtitles)
introduction: In this transformative motivational speech, we explore the profound journey of overcoming anxiety an

vocabulary.definition: the quality of being easily hurt or influenced
vocabulary.example: Showing vulnerability can lead to deeper connections with others.

vocabulary.definition: speaking very softly using one's breath rather than one's throat, especially for the sake of secrecy
vocabulary.example: The wind carried whispers of secrets through the trees.

vocabulary.definition: the events that will necessarily happen to a particular person or thing in the future
vocabulary.example: They believed in fate, trusting that their destinies were already written.

vocabulary.definition: a person or thing that precipitates an event or change
vocabulary.example: The new policy acted as a catalyst for improved communication within the team.

vocabulary.definition: the quality or fact of being very determined; determination
vocabulary.example: Her tenacity in pursuing her goals inspired those around her.

vocabulary.definition: lasting over a period of time; remaining strong or in existence
vocabulary.example: Their enduring friendship survived many challenges and changes.
